trans-unit.source: Provides an editor for selecting message body files in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gir et redigeringsprogram for å velge meldingsfiler brødteksten i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor class provides a user interface for selecting a file for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor gir et brukergrensesnitt for å velge en fil for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> specifies the file that contains the e-mail message body.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>angir filen som inneholder meldingsteksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objects define the content and format of the e-mail notification messages that are sent by controls.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objekter definerer innhold og formatet på e-postvarsling-meldinger som sendes av kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> controls use the MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>Kontroller bruk av MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor is invoked, for example, by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **BodyFileName** property, under **MailDefinition**, in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor aktiveres, for eksempel ved å velge ellipsen (**... **)-knappen på den **BodyFileName** egenskapen, under **MailDefinition**i den **Egenskaper** rutenett med den visuelle utformeren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Caption%2A> property specifies the caption that is to appear on the MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor form.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Caption%2A>egenskapen angir teksten som skal vises i skjemaet MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Caption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter%2A> property returns the list of file types that is to be accepted by the MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter%2A>egenskapen returnerer listen over filtyper som skal godkjennes av MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor> class when you invoke the editor in a control that encapsulates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework internt bygger en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor>klasse når du starter redigeringsprogrammet i en kontroll som innkapsler en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor>

trans-unit.source: For example, you select the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **BodyFileName** property, under **MailDefinition**, in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer, when designing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: Du for eksempel velge ellipsen (**... **)-knappen på den **BodyFileName** egenskapen, under **MailDefinition**i den **Egenskaper** rutenett med den visuelle utformeren når du utformer en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption to appear on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor"></xref> form.
trans-unit.target: Henter teksten skal vises på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor"> </xref> skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The default value for the Caption property is a message instructing the user to select an e-mail file.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen tittel er en melding om brukeren å velge en postfil for e.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the caption to appear on the editor form.
trans-unit.target: En streng som teksten skal vises i skjemaet redigeringsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of file types for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor"></xref> object to accept.
trans-unit.target: Henter listen over filtyper for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MailDefinitionBodyFileNameEditor"> </xref> objektet til å godta.

trans-unit.source: The format for the Filter property for each type is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: Formatet for Filter-egenskapen for hver type er som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: A user-friendly description.
trans-unit.target: En brukervennlig beskrivelse.

trans-unit.source: A vertical bar (`|`).
trans-unit.target: En loddrett strek (`|`).

trans-unit.source: File specifications, separated by a semicolon (`;`).
trans-unit.target: Filen spesifikasjoner, atskilt med semikolon (`;`).

trans-unit.source: Another vertical bar (`|`).
trans-unit.target: En annen loddrett strek (`|`).

trans-unit.source: For example, a filter that specifies text files, HTML files, and all files would look like the following example, in EN-US locale: `Text Files(*.txt)|*.txt|HTML Files(*.htm;*.html)|*.htm;*.html|All Files(*.*)|*.*|` A localized version of this string is the default value for the Filter.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel se et filter som angir tekstfiler, HTML-filer og alle filer som følgende eksempel på EN-US nasjonal innstilling: `Text Files(*.txt)|*.txt|HTML Files(*.htm;*.html)|*.htm;*.html|All Files(*.*)|*.*|` en lokalisert versjon av denne strengen er standardverdien for filteret.

trans-unit.source: A string specifying a user-friendly name for each accepted file type and file specifications for each type.
trans-unit.target: En streng som angir et brukervennlig navn for hver godtatt filtypen og filen spesifikasjoner for hver type.
